pr_title: Add explicit names to metrics/trace SPI factories

timeline.bodyText:
i think it's a little confusing why we support multiple names without a bit of explanation: Suggested change * Returns names of metric servers supported by this factory. * Returns names of metric servers supported by this factory. * *

Multiple names are useful for enabling a pair of span and metric exporters using the same * name, while still having separate names for enabling them individually.
timeline.author: trask
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,4 +24,11 @@
    * @param config The configuration
    */
   void start(MetricProducer producer, Properties config);
+
+  /**
+   * Returns names of metric servers supported by this factory.

timeline.bodyText:
same as above Suggested change * Returns names of span exporters supported by this factory. * Returns names of span exporters supported by this factory. * *

Multiple names are useful for enabling a pair of span and metric exporters using the same * name, while still having separate names for enabling them individually.
timeline.author: trask
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,4 +22,11 @@
    * @return An implementation of a {@link SpanExporter}
    */
   SpanExporter fromConfig(Properties config);
+
+  /**
+   * Returns names of span exporters supported by this factory.

timeline.author: iNikem

timeline.message:
Add explicit names to metrics/trace SPI factories

Signed-off-by: Pavol Loffay <p.loffay@gmail.com>
